ing: 4 potatoes, peeled and cut into 1 inch cubes
2 green bell peppers, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 (16 ounce) package kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
des: "This is an old recipe from my grandmother. 'Good Polish-Slovak food!'  She would always say.  'Eat more!'"
ins: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.  Cook onions and potatoes for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Reduce flame to med and stir in bell pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Cover, and cook 5 minutes. Stir in kielbasa, cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until onions are caramelized.
